resources.string: FOSSmaster lets user to access github for open source projects. It contains a "Dashboard" section which shows repositeries of user followers and the repositeries which are starred by user. "My Repositeries" section shows all projects on which user had worked and is currently working upon. "Starred Repositeries" section lists all the projects on which user may wish to work upon in future. "Open Source Contribution" section initially makes user to select their level as beginner, medium or expert. According to the selection of level, app chooses repos on which user can contribute and it is increased each time user makes 5 commits. Therefore the app helps user to increase their knowledge about contribution in open source projects and prepare them for higher competitions.
